content:
CompileWorkflowTask Class

In this Article

Represents the MSBuild task of compiling a workflow. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public sealed class CompileWorkflowTask : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task, Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task
  • CompileWorkflowTask

Inherited Members

BuildEngine
,

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

This class extends the Task class of Microsoft Build framework. Methods of this class are invoked by the Microsoft Build framework to customize the build process when compiling Windows Workflow Foundation types of C# and Visual Basic projects. It provides support for compiling .xoml files into intermediate code files (either C# or Visual Basic). Workflows are validated before compiling.

Constructors summary

CompileWorkflowTask()

Initializes a new instance of the CompileWorkflowTask class.

Properties summary

AssemblyName

Gets and sets the name of the assembly that is built during compilation.
BuildingProject

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this build task is currently building the workflow project.
CompilationOptions

Gets or sets the compilation options.
DelaySign

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow assembly will be delay signed.
HostObject

Gets or sets the Object that is used to obtain services provided by the Visual Studio host when the compile workflow task is invoked.
Imports

Gets or sets a string that contains all the imports directives for the compilation of the workflow.
KeepTemporaryFiles

Gets a Boolean value that determines whether temporary files are to be kept.
KeyContainer

Gets or sets the name of the public/private key container used for signing the workflow assembly.
KeyFile

Gets or sets the path of the file that is used for signing the workflow assembly.
OutputFiles

Gets an array of paths to output files from the workflow project being compiled.
ProjectDirectory

Gets or sets a string that contains the path of the directory that contains the workflow project.
ProjectExtension

Gets or sets a string that contains the file name extension for the workflow project.
ReferenceFiles

Gets or sets an array of paths to reference files for the workflow project being compiled.
ResourceFiles

Gets or sets an array of paths to resource files for the workflow project being compiled.
RootNamespace

Gets or sets the root namespace for the workflow project being compiled.
SourceCodeFiles

Gets or sets an array of paths to Visual Basic or C# files in the workflow project being compiled.
TargetFramework

Gets or sets the target .NET Framework of the current project.
TemporaryFiles

Gets an array of paths to temporary files created by the build task for the workflow project being compiled.
WorkflowMarkupFiles

Gets or sets an array of paths to Workflow Markup Files for the workflow project being compiled.

Methods summary

Execute()

Runs the compilation of the workflow task.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

ITask.HostObject

Gets or sets the Host Object in the Microsoft Build framework.

Constructors

  • CompileWorkflowTask()

    Initializes a new instance of the CompileWorkflowTask class.

    public CompileWorkflowTask ();

Properties

  • AssemblyName

    Gets and sets the name of the assembly that is built during compilation.

    public string AssemblyName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A String that contains the name of the assembly.

  • BuildingProject

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this build task is currently building the workflow project.

    public bool BuildingProject { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if this build task is currently building the workflow project; otherwise, false.

  • CompilationOptions

    Gets or sets the compilation options.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] CompilationOptions { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The compilation options.

  • DelaySign

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow assembly will be delay signed.

    public bool DelaySign { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the assembly will be delay signed; otherwise, false.

  • HostObject

    Gets or sets the Object that is used to obtain services provided by the Visual Studio host when the compile workflow task is invoked.

    public object HostObject { get; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      The Object that is used to obtain services provided by Visual Studio host when the compile workflow task is invoked.

    Remarks

    The value for this property is set by the workflow project system just before compilation starts.

  • Imports

    Gets or sets a string that contains all the imports directives for the compilation of the workflow.

    public string Imports { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains all the imports directives for the compilation of the workflow.

  • KeepTemporaryFiles

    Gets a Boolean value that determines whether temporary files are to be kept.

    public string KeepTemporaryFiles { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      true if temporary files are to be kept; otherwise, false.

  • KeyContainer

    Gets or sets the name of the public/private key container used for signing the workflow assembly.

    public string KeyContainer { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the public/private key container used for signing the workflow assembly.

  • KeyFile

    Gets or sets the path of the file that is used for signing the workflow assembly.

    public string KeyFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The path of the file that is used for signing the workflow assembly.

    Remarks

    This file is usually of type .snk.

  • OutputFiles

    Gets an array of paths to output files from the workflow project being compiled.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] OutputFiles { get; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      An array of paths to output files from the workflow project being compiled.

    Remarks

    These files are temporary files and may be removed after compilation, depending the value of the KeepTemporaryFiles property.

  • ProjectDirectory

    Gets or sets a string that contains the path of the directory that contains the workflow project.

    public string ProjectDirectory { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the path of the directory that contains the workflow project.

  • ProjectExtension

    Gets or sets a string that contains the file name extension for the workflow project.

    public string ProjectExtension { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the file name extension for the workflow project.

  • ReferenceFiles

    Gets or sets an array of paths to reference files for the workflow project being compiled.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ReferenceFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      An array of paths to reference files for the workflow project being compiled.

  • ResourceFiles

    Gets or sets an array of paths to resource files for the workflow project being compiled.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ResourceFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      An array of paths to resource files for the workflow project being compiled.

  • RootNamespace

    Gets or sets the root namespace for the workflow project being compiled.

    public string RootNamespace { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The root namespace for the workflow project being compiled.

  • SourceCodeFiles

    Gets or sets an array of paths to Visual Basic or C# files in the workflow project being compiled.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] SourceCodeFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      An array of paths to Visual Basic or C# files in the workflow project being compiled.

  • TargetFramework

    Gets or sets the target .NET Framework of the current project.

    public string TargetFramework { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The target .NET Framework of the current project.

  • TemporaryFiles

    Gets an array of paths to temporary files created by the build task for the workflow project being compiled.

    public string[] TemporaryFiles { get; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      An array of paths to temporary files created by the build task for the workflow project being compiled.

  • WorkflowMarkupFiles

    Gets or sets an array of paths to Workflow Markup Files for the workflow project being compiled.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] WorkflowMarkupFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      An array of paths to Workflow Markup Files for the workflow project being compiled.

Methods

  • Execute()

    Runs the compilation of the workflow task.

    public override bool Execute ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • ITask.HostObject

    Gets or sets the Host Object in the Microsoft Build framework.

    Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask.HostObject { get; set; }

    Returns

    • ITaskHost

      The Host Object from the Microsoft Build framework.
